metadata.title: CVE-2023-0188 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows and Linux contains a vulnerability inthe kernel mode layer handler, where an unprivileged user can causeimproper restriction of operations within the bounds of a memory buffercause an out-of-bounds read, which may lead to denial of service.

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-304: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
